title: Design the smart fabric for temperature and vital signs monitoring
description: Develop a fabric capable of sensing and transmitting temperature and vital signs data in real-time.

title: Define the hardware requirements for temperature and vital signs sensors
description: Identify suitable hardware components for temperature and vital signs sensors, considering factors such as accuracy, power consumption, and integration.
dependencies: Design the smart fabric for temperature and vital signs monitoring

title: Develop a real-time data processing algorithm
description: Create an efficient algorithm to process the incoming data from the sensors and derive useful insights.
dependencies: Design the smart fabric for temperature and vital signs monitoring

title: Design the user interface for displaying real-time data
description: Create an intuitive and easy-to-use interface to present the data from the sensors.
dependencies: Design the smart fabric for temperature and vital signs monitoring

title: Perform initial security assessment of the design
description: Identify potential security vulnerabilities in the design and propose countermeasures.
dependencies: Design the smart fabric for temperature and vital signs monitoring

title: Create Technical Documentation for the Project
description: Write clear and concise documentation detailing the design, implementation, and usage of the smart clothes. This documentation should also include integration with existing health monitoring systems and devices.
dependencies: Design the smart fabric for temperature and vital signs monitoring
